summary: TAKATA RECALL I'VE CONTACTED NISSAN OF NORTH AMERICA AND TWO DIFFERENT DEALERS ABOUT GETTING MY AIR BAG REPLACED OR GETTING A RENTAL FOR THREE WEEKS WITH NO LUCK THE DEALERSHIP SAID THE AIRBAG WOULD BE IN IN A WEEK THREE WEEKS LATER NO AIRBAGS I CALLED NISSAN OF NORTH AMERICAN AND ASKED ABOUT A RENTAL TILL THEY COME IN AND I KEEP GETTING THE RUN AROUND FIRST IT WAS WE CAN'T GET YOU A RENTAL BC YOU DON'T HAVE INSURANCE WHICH I TOLD THEM I CLEARLY DO AND WOULD BE HAPPY TO PROVIDE IT THAN THEY HAVE NO RENTAL AVAILABLE I'VE STOPED DRIVING THE CAR DEW TO THE SAFETY ISSUES AND WOULD LIKE TO GET THIS RESOLVED SO I CAN START DRIVING MY CAR AGAIN
